title: Define Project Requirements - RFC Review
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the NetworkTrafficAnalyzer system. This includes: desired features (such as real-time traffic visualization, anomaly detection, and alerting mechanisms), performance goals (including real-time processing capabilities and scalability), security considerations (data encryption, authentication, access controls, intrusion detection, and incident response plans), integration with existing systems (e.g., firewalls, network equipment, SIEM solutions), compliance with relevant industry standards and regulations (GDPR, HIPAA, etc.), clear documentation for each requirement to facilitate development, testing, and maintenance, a well-defined roadmap for phased implementation, and a focus on creating modular, extensible, and easily maintainable system architecture. The RFC also requests a thorough review of the requirements by all relevant stakeholders, including frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, qa-tester, security-specialist, and technical-writer. Lastly, the RFC should be updated with more specific details on how each requirement will impact development timelines, resource allocation, and budget.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the NetworkTrafficAnalyzer system, including the components, data flow, and communication protocols.

title: Develop Network Traffic Capture Module
description: Implement the module responsible for capturing and preprocessing network traffic data.

title: Develop AI-based Threat Detection Engine
description: Implement the AI algorithms and models for analyzing network traffic patterns and detecting potential security threats.

title: Design and Implement Database
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing network traffic data, threat detection results, and other system data.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the NetworkTrafficAnalyzer system, including visualization of network traffic patterns and threat detection results.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect the NetworkTrafficAnalyzer system and the data it processes, including access controls, encryption, and auditing.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Set up a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for the NetworkTrafficAnalyzer system to automate the build, testing, and deployment processes.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite for the NetworkTrafficAnalyzer system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Write documentation for the NetworkTrafficAnalyzer system, including user manuals, technical documentation, and deployment guides.
